text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/adc17a5f9d207fd1623fd923457a46efc9214777|patch 8.2.0915: search() cannot skip over matches like searchpair() can>
patch 8.2.0915: search() cannot skip over matches like searchpair() can

Problem:    Search() cannot skip over matches like searchpair() can.
Solution:   Add an optional "skip" argument. (Christian Brabandt, closes #861)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0915: search() cannot skip over matches like searchpair() can · vim/vim@adc17a5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0915: search() cannot skip over matches like searchpair() can · vim/vim@adc17a5
attachments.text: Problem: Search() cannot skip over matches like searchpair() can. Solution: Add an optional "skip" argument. (Christian Brabandt, closes #861)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/975a880a1389e8ce6dea8d66a7c109140b2f94ec|patch 8.2.0916: mapping with partly modifyOtherKeys code does not work>
patch 8.2.0916: mapping with partly modifyOtherKeys code does not work

Problem:    Mapping with partly modifyOtherKeys code does not work.
Solution:   If there is no mapping with a separate modifier include the
            modifier in the key and then try mapping again. (closes #6200)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0916: mapping with partly modifyOtherKeys code does not work · vim/vim@975a880
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0916: mapping with partly modifyOtherKeys code does not work · vim/vim@975a880
attachments.text: Problem: Mapping with partly modifyOtherKeys code does not work. Solution: If there is no mapping with a separate modifier include the modifier in the key and then try mapping agai...

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e928366de5deca359fad779a4f740db703296302|patch 8.2.0917: quickfix entries do not suport a "note" type>
patch 8.2.0917: quickfix entries do not suport a "note" type

Problem:    Quickfix entries do not suport a "note" type.
Solution:   Add support for "note". (partly by Yegappan Lakshmanan,
            closes #5527, closes #6216)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0917: quickfix entries do not suport a "note" type · vim/vim@e928366
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0917: quickfix entries do not suport a "note" type · vim/vim@e928366
attachments.text: Problem: Quickfix entries do not suport a "note" type. Solution: Add support for "note". (partly by Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5527, closes #6216)

patch 8.2.0918: duplicate code for evaluating expression argument

Problem:    Duplicate code for evaluating expression argument.
Solution:   Merge the code and make the use more flexible.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/673fc3e23f09095d17f0095c4323958041b2d0d2|patch 8.2.0919: merging modifier for modifyOtherKeys is done twice>
patch 8.2.0919: merging modifier for modifyOtherKeys is done twice

Problem:    Merging modifier for modifyOtherKeys is done twice.
Solution:   Remove the merging done in vgetc().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0919: merging modifier for modifyOtherKeys is done twice · vim/vim@673fc3e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0919: merging modifier for modifyOtherKeys is done twice · vim/vim@673fc3e
attachments.text: Problem: Merging modifier for modifyOtherKeys is done twice. Solution: Remove the merging done in vgetc().

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5b157fe2edfdce5f77080aeac2b4a03f39eb1c1a|patch 8.2.0920: writing viminfo fails with a circular reference>
patch 8.2.0920: writing viminfo fails with a circular reference

Problem:    Writing viminfo fails with a circular reference.
Solution:   Use copyID to detect the cycle. (closes #6217)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0920: writing viminfo fails with a circular reference · vim/vim@5b157fe
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0920: writing viminfo fails with a circular reference · vim/vim@5b157fe
attachments.text: Problem: Writing viminfo fails with a circular reference. Solution: Use copyID to detect the cycle. (closes #6217)
